result.execSummary:
Patrick James Adler was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Patrick James Adler was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court's directive to clerk to disbuse the bond $.
Judge Czajkowski informs the Clerk that the prosecutor has confirmed Mr. Adler's return to Pennsylvania.  Court orders bond $ released.
Criminal Docket from Greene County, PA -- indicates that Defendant returned to Greene County, PA on April 15, 2015 at 2:10 p.m.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Patrick James Adler
Current: 237 W 5th St, Apt B, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 04-10-2015)
Prior: 877 W. Seminary Street, Richland Center, WI 53581
Court grants right to release on bail - $1000 cash.  As a condition of bail, Defendant must report to Greene County Sheriff's Department, Greene County, Pennsylvania no later than April 15, 2015.

Judge Sharp has recused himself from this matter.  Case is not formally re-assigned yet at the time of this year.  Appearances:  Defendant Patrick James Adler in court. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal appeared by phone means for Defendant Patrick James Adler.  Court states this hearing is being held per 976.03.  A warrant has been issued by the State of Pennsylvania for def's appearance there.  ADA asks for 1k cash bond to secure def's appearance.  Atty. M addresses the Court.  Def has decided not to waive extradition.  Court states that def may be released on bail on the charges stated in the warrant.  Court grants right to release on bail - $1000 cash.  As a condition of bail, def to return to the State of Pennsylvania, County of Greene, no later than 5 days from today's date.  If def fails to do so, def to be returned to Richland County Jail.  Atty. M asks that the "5 days" be from the date the $ is posted.  Def's mother has the $ and will be posting it today.  Given that information, Court states that def must report to Greene County Sheriff's Department, Greene County, PA no later than April 15, 2015.

ADA asks for telephone status scheduling - conference call to Prairie du Chien - call of counsel to Court only - to follow status of def's return to PA.  Court directs ADA to make arrangements for that scheduling.  Said conference to occur after April 16.
packet received from Richland County Sheriff's Department which includes arrest warrant from Greene County, Pennsylvania
